questions.question: Why did Jess resent Leslie's father at first?

choices.answer: He smelled bad.
He was a grown up.
He took up too much of Leslie's time.
He was mean.

questions.question: When did Jess' feelings about Leslie's father change?

choices.answer: When her father gave him food.
When he invited him to a party.
When he helped him with his homework.
When Jess helped him work on his house.

questions.question: What imaginary event happened when Jess and Leslie returned to Terabithia?

choices.answer: Enemies attacked them.
Monkeys stole their treasure.
A troll came to eat them.
They had a picnic together.

questions.question: Why was Janice Avery crying in the bathroom?

choices.answer: She dropped an ice cream cone.
Willard Hughes did not like her.
Her father beat her.
Two girls told all of seventh grade that her father beat her

questions.question: Why didn't Jess think that Leslie should have more friends?

choices.answer: He thought they weren't worth her trouble.
He was jealous.
Everyone at their school was mean.
He was worried about someone hurting her.

questions.question: Why couldn't Jess' family buy new clothes for church at first?

choices.answer: Their car broke down.
Church was cancelled.
Jess' father was laid off and wasn't working.
The preacher told them new clothes weren't allowed.

questions.question: What did Leslie think of church?

choices.answer: It was better than a movie.
It was boring.
It was too long.
It was scary.

questions.question: Why hadn't Jess' mom wanted Leslie to come to church?

choices.answer: She didn't believe in God.
Jess' mom didn't like her parents.
She was not a nice person.
Jess' mom didn't think she would dress properly.

questions.question: What did Leslie say that made Jess shocked in chapter 8?

choices.answer: She thought he was dressed nicely.
She liked his mom.
She wondered if the Bible was true.
She was glad she came to church.
